content.rendered:
Directed by Shivam Tiwari

Written by Pritam Jha. Param Kalra. Param Kalra. Nishant Malkani. Nisant

Cast Rahul Dev.Shivam Tiwari.Sophia Singh . Naglaa Boodhun (Bit part). Kirti Choudhary (Sonal). Prashant Kumar Gupta (Prashant). Rajkumar Kanojia. Hemant Pandey

Language Hindi

Producers Adhir Gunness. Rajeev Kapoor
